title: [GSoC Snippet] 19/07/2014
author: Maciej (Developer Website)
content:
[code] added Facebook and Twitter notifiers implementation, pushing to Google Plus stream is impossible, because of read-only API, added new posts comparer, getting posts from feed, etc.

Tomorrow I will add command line interface (like supybot or planet) to get all things works, then I will need some time to tests. :)
Originally posted on pino IT / ruby / developer
